1.FaceText: You got through the window easily, but there is a container on the floor with a toxic gas hissing out of it. How will you avoid being poisoned?

2.FaceText: You got into the room, but you find it is completely dark and you can hear ticking. What will you do?

3.FaceText: Someone heard you enter the window. They're coming, and it appears there is nowhere to hide. What are you going to do?

4.FaceText: You’re standing inside the unlocked door, but now feel the click of a bomb under your foot. What are you going to do?

5.FaceText: You're peaking up from the basement hatch and feel something heavy resting on it. How will you open the hatch without breaking the heavy object?

26.FaceText: There are two hostages claiming they know the combination to the one-try-only safe where your item is. How will you figure out which is telling the truth?

27.FaceText: Your item is in a large crate in the room, with the lid nailed down. How will you get it open?

28.FaceText: The item you need is locked in a safe. How will you crack it open?

29.FaceText: The item you need is behind a hidden door. How will you find the door?

30.FaceText: The item you need is being guarded by two growling dogs. How will you get past them?

31.FaceText: The item you need is surrounded by detecting lasers that will set off an alarm. How will you get the item?

32.FaceText: The item you need to retrieve is behind some thick steel bars. How will you get it out?

33.FaceText: The item you need to get is locked in an elaborate chest with large chains and locks. How will you get it out?

34.FaceText: The item you need to retrieve is in a small pool with piranhas swimming around it. How will you get the item?

35.FaceText: The item you need to retrieve is surrounded by tripwires linked to a bomb. How will you get the item?

36.FaceText: The item you need is tied to a conveyer belt approaching a sharp rotating saw. How will you get it in time?

37.FaceText: The item you need is under one of three boxes. Two boxes will trigger alarms if moved. How will you figure out which box has your item?

38.FaceText: The item you need is here, but the area is full of smoke. How will you find the item quickly?

39.FaceText: There are three items that look the same. You can only carry one. How will you figure out which one is the item you need to retrieve?

40.FaceText: There is a huge boulder on top of the item you need to retrieve. How will you get it from under the rock?

51.FaceText: There are bars on the windows and doors, how will you get out?

52.FaceText: There is a hungry panther between you and the window, how will you get out?

53.FaceText: The locked door has a keypad for unlocking it, how will you get out?

54.FaceText: There is a steel door ahead of you, and because you know the owners, there will be another one after that. How will you get out?

55.FaceText: There is a iron gate that keeps moving up and down quickly. You’ll certainly be squashed if you attempt to slide through. How will you get out?

56.FaceText: All doors are locked, but there is a chimney. How will you get out?

13.Gadget: Make a fake money detection kit

1.Advice: Include a comment on how they could have used ancient karate

2.Advice: Include a comment on how it is important to drink milk before a mission

3.Advice: Include a comment on how they could have used oranges

4.Advice: Include a comment on their calculator-like accuracy

5.Advice: Include a comment on their impressive ninja-like ability

6.Advice: Include a comment on their respectful adherence to the Rules of Spies Book Volume 2

7.Advice: Include a comment on their lack of turtlenecks

8.Advice: Include a comment on their incredible spy-like elbows

9.Advice: Include a comment on the tactical use of sideways glances

10.Advice: Include a comment on their clever employment of Spy Protocol No. 45

11.Advice: Include a comment on their spy-like hair

12.Advice: Include a comment on how they should have had their names sewn into their underpants

13.Advice: Include a comment on their ability hide behind bushes when necessary

14.Advice: Include a comment on the time you battled snakes during a mission

15.Advice: Include a comment on their left-hair-part skills

16.Advice: Include a comment on their tactical use of gingerbread

17.Advice: Include a comment on the effect of gravity on the mission

18.Advice: Include a comment on their clever use of vegetables

19.Advice: Include a comment on the importance of a good breakfast

20.Advice: Include a comment on the importance of subverting the laws the physics

21.Advice: Include a comment on how Patchouli incense may have helped

22.Advice: Include a comment on the need for more pizza in the mission

23.Advice: Include a comment on their ingenuity during the mission climax

24.Advice: Include a comment on the need to wear comfortable socks

25.Advice: Include a comment on how cupcakes are yummy

26.Advice: Include a comment on how they could have used bubbles

27.Advice: Include a comment on the need for more balloons

28.Advice: Include a comment on the need to use their eyebrows more

29.Advice: Include a comment on the need for more explosions

30.Advice: Include a comment on their lack of bean bags

31.Advice: Include a comment on how candy would have helped

32.Advice: Include a comment on how well they used telepathy

33.Advice: Include a comment on how their mission reminded you of moonlight on the water

34.Advice: Include a comment on their clever use of vowels

35.Advice: Include a comment on the sophisticated use of their toes

36.Advice: Include a comment on their ingenious use of the breeze

37.Advice: Include a comment on how their nostrils were very professional

38.Advice: Include a comment on their tactical use of collage

39.Advice: Include a comment on how next time they should do rhythmic blinking

40.Advice: Include a comment on how the most elegant people keep their toenails short

41.Advice: Include a comment on how you dreamt last night of being a lamp, a very still lamp

42.Advice: Include a comment on how we should all get cheaper Spy Insurance once we've graduated

43.Advice: Include a comment on how the use of more plaid would have helped

44.Advice: Include a comment on how they need to make sure they pee before going on a mission

45.Advice: Include a comment on your preferred duration of tooth-brushing time
